General.Name: MESB Bhd
General.Description: MESB Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in trading and retailing leather products, apparels, and accessories for men, women, and children and babies primarily in Malaysia. It offers ladies handbags and small leather goods; gents bags and accessories; and men's small leather goods. As of June 30, 2022, the company sells its products through approximately 837 consignment counters in departmental stores and 5 boutiques in shopping malls, as well as through miroza.com.my, an e-commerce site and e-commerce platforms, such as Lazada and Shopee. It also provides waste recycling services. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Seri Kembangan, Malaysia.
